content:
# Cardano News Shorts

![](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14Gi_oxk8GptB2amZUsoohZ2f3Qg61R7WBLzh1LdP=s96-c)

This is a YouTube shorts featuring Cardano news that happend over the last few days. A video is uploaded every few days, depending on the news. You can also find me on twitter: S-Cap-ADA. ☺️

## 2 contributors

![](https://ucarecdn.com/4f580f1c-e076-45b2-8a8d-af75d20c0cfd/)
![](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14Gi_oxk8GptB2amZUsoohZ2f3Qg61R7WBLzh1LdP=s96-c)

## Would you like to suggest changes to this video?

We encourage you to actively participate in the creation and moderation of our content—your contributions are invaluable. All content is reviewed by another community member.
